alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 1:28PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Poinsett, central Mississippi, northwestern Crittenden, northeastern Cross, west central Tipton and central Lauderdale Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 127 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blytheville to 8 miles north of Parkin. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Osceola, Marked Tree, Luxora, Wilson, Tyronza, Keiser, Fort Pillow State Park, Joiner, Dyess, Burdette, Gilmore, Bassett, Marie, Fulton, Ashport, Turrell, Birdsong, Victoria and Edith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
